title: Las Vegas 'New Frontier' hotel western style display serif
content:
Can anyone please tell me the name of the font used for 'FRONTIER'?

[http://img.groundspeak.com/waymarking/display/63088a81-14fe-4e10-8dfc-91...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017143250/http:/img.groundspeak.com/waymarking/display/63088a81-14fe-4e10-8dfc-9126263dc614.jpg "http://img.groundspeak.com/waymarking/display/63088a81-14fe-4e10-8dfc-9126263dc614.jpg")

Thanks.
author: AARONWHITE

comments.content: No font was used, it was custom made like most signs of that era, but you can find a few " [wild west" fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017143250/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12892) of a similar style. [Old Towne](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017143250/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/old_towne_no_536_ot_std/?sample_text=FRONTIER&sample_size=96) may be the closest.
